suggestions.why: To show the monthly sales trends over time and capture how sales for the specific product A change in the year 2024, the line plot is optimal. It effectively visualizes trends over a time series with clear continuous time structures (each month in this case) for a single series.

alternatives.why: Monthly bar chart is an alternative; while comparable in resolving trends, it intermittently misleads by emphasizing discrete differences in sales quantities between months, without inherently portraying the continuous change ideally depicted with line plots.

To emphasize monthly trends, consolidating the temporal focus to monthly will be useful but a line plot, structured with time-axis as 'date.month', suffices. Reducing visual complexity maintains interpretability in this case.
